description: Re-arm your Mustang Survival M.I.T. 100 Inflatable PFD. Manufacturers recommend that manual and automatic PFDs be re-armed after deployment, and the inflator bobbin on automatic PFDs regularly replaced.Contains a 24 gram CO2 cylinder and bayonet assembly, bobbin and re-arming instruction manual.
name: Mustang Survival Re-Arm Kit MA2014
